alert.note: Alert for Western Highland (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 24 at 10:03AM EST until December 25 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...In Maryland, Garrett and Extreme Western Allegany Counties. In Virginia, Western Highland County. In West Virginia, Western Grant, Western Mineral and Western Pendleton Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
